title: Update NK SYSTECH logo asset in-place

requirements.summary: Replace the existing generated logo file in-place so all UI references to /assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png display the newly uploaded nk.png logo without changing any code paths.
acceptanceCriteria: The file at frontend/public/assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png is replaced/updated using the provided nk.png artwork (properly resized/cropped as needed).
The header logo and footer logo continue to reference /assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png and display the new uploaded logo correctly.
No other site images (e.g., hero/banner) are changed.

file_operations.description: Replace the contents of this file with the newly uploaded nk.png artwork, ensuring it remains a 512x512 PNG (cropped/resized as needed) while keeping the exact same filename and path so Header/Footer (and any other usages) automatically show the updated logo without any code changes.
